title: Between the Scenes - How Trump Challenges the Politics of Love and Hate
itunes:title: Between the Scenes - How Trump Challenges the Politics of Love and Hate
description:
On a human level, Trevor understands why President Trump would be hesitant to work with Democrats on infrastructure after they called for an impeachment probe.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
